Name: Paula Deen Signature 8-Inch Chef's Knife
Price: Price When Reviewed: $29.95 for a 3-Piece Set
contro:
Neither consumers nor trained chefs found this knife easy to use
  • Poor at slicing onions and tomatoes
pro:
Very good at mincing garlic, slicing carrots, and cutting basil into thin ribbons
  • Remained sharp after extended use in GHRI tests
